sqlMap.select: /* DistStatDAO.selectMonAll */ SELECT TRN, SUM(DECODE(SMON,'01',ACNT,'')) AS M01, SUM(DECODE(SMON,'02',ACNT,'')) AS M02, SUM(DECODE(SMON,'03',ACNT,'')) AS M03, SUM(DECODE(SMON,'04',ACNT,'')) AS M04, SUM(DECODE(SMON,'05',ACNT,'')) AS M05, SUM(DECODE(SMON,'06',ACNT,'')) AS M06, SUM(DECODE(SMON,'07',ACNT,'')) AS M07, SUM(DECODE(SMON,'08',ACNT,'')) AS M08, SUM(DECODE(SMON,'09',ACNT,'')) AS M09, SUM(DECODE(SMON,'10',ACNT,'')) AS M10, SUM(DECODE(SMON,'11',ACNT,'')) AS M11, SUM(DECODE(SMON,'12',ACNT,'')) AS M12, SUM(ACNT) AS TOT FROM ( SELECT '전체' AS TRN, SUBSTR(STND_MON,1,4) AS SYEAR, SUBSTR(STND_MON,5,2) AS SMON, AUTO_DRIVING_DIST AS ACNT FROM TB_ST_HT_TEMP_AUTO_MON WHERE 1=1 AND STND_MON LIKE #sDate#||'%' ) X GROUP BY TRN ORDER BY TRN

/* DistStatDAO.selectMonAllChart */ SELECT '전체' AS TRN, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(STND_MON,'YYYYMM'),'MM')||'월' AS STERM, SUM(AUTO_DRIVING_DIST) AS ACNT FROM TB_ST_HT_TEMP_AUTO_MON WHERE 1=1 AND STND_MON LIKE #sDate#||'%' GROUP BY STND_MON ORDER BY STERM

/* DistStatDAO.selectYearAllChart */ SELECT '전체' AS TRN, STND_YEAR||'년' AS STERM, SUM(AUTO_DRIVING_DIST) AS ACNT FROM TB_ST_HT_TEMP_AUTO_YEAR WHERE 1=1 AND STND_YEAR BETWEEN #sDate# AND #eDate# GROUP BY STND_YEAR ORDER BY STERM
